title: Pressing 'Enter' in the Order Number field does not lead to the Order Status page or error window
preconditions: Main page of WebApp is opened
stepsToReproduce: Click the 'Order Number' field in the header
Enter an existing order number into the field
expectedResult: When pressing 'Enter' after entering an existing (or non-existing) order number, the user is redirected to the Order Status page or an error window is displayed.
actualResult: When pressing 'Enter' after entering an existing (or non-existing) order number, no redirection to the Order Status page or error window occurs.
notes: Check the Enter key event handler for the Order Number field; possibly a form submission or key listener issue.

title: The 'GO' button is missing to the right of the 'Order Number' field in the header
preconditions: Main page of WebApp is opened
stepsToReproduce: Look at the top right corner near the 'Order Number' field
expectedResult: The 'GO' button is displayed to the right of the 'Order Number' field.
actualResult: The 'GO' button to the right of the 'Order Number' field is missing.
notes: According to the design or requirements, the GO button should be displayed â€” possibly hidden by CSS/JS or not rendered at certain resolutions.

title: Duplicate 'Order Status' button displayed on the Order Status page (next to 'Order' button)
stepsToReproduce: Look at the top right corner of the window (next to the 'Order' button)
expectedResult: The 'Order Status' button in the top right corner is not displayed (should not be duplicated).
actualResult: A duplicate 'Order Status' button is displayed on the Order Status page next to the 'Order' button.
notes: Possible duplication of a navigation element; check component rendering conditions and visibility at different screen resolutions.
